sentence: Okay so some of the rooms may need updating a bit but this did not spoil our holiday in any way we did actually get offered a different room but decided to stay where we were as the location was better for us and they offered to sorted the issue lack of plug socket for the coffee machine nothing major

The rooms are rather dated and fixtures fittings etc are old but an extensive renovation project is planned from mid July until beginning of November in fact the hotel is closing for the summer weeks – I do hope they do n’t lose any of the old world charm this hotel has
You ’re forced We understand that the suites are scheduled for renovations but please be careful not to disturb the current charm and ambiance
Unfortunately I can not remember any names but I honestly never came across a single staff member from maintenance to manager that was not the best
We can not wait to see what renovations lie ahead with Couples San Souci
I realize that you are updating part of property but the whole resort should be torn down and started from scratch in order to be rated Five Star
They are completely redoing the rooms in the two buildings at the lower level on the beach
But their renovation will not touch the indifferent service

I am disappointed in Couples ’ and CSS ’ management for not living up to the promises it made to its guests regarding the level of customer service and not starting the renovation until after all guests had left the resort on July 9th
Because of the renovation blocks A and B nearest to the beach were unavailable as well as the Palazina restaurant
Our first three nights were spent in C block before we moved to the newly renovated A2
And the newly renovated Palazina restaurant now even features wood burning oven pizza
The renovations are a nice upgrade but do n’t seem to represent a good value for what it most probably cost5
We stayed in the renovated rooms in B building
Rooms in the A and B block have been remodeled
And in regards to what I mentioned about room being updated they do have other blocksA B
Mr Bataglia you have a wonderful staff from maintenance to the supervisors
A tour of the Beach front rooms shows that most if not all rooms have been tastefully renovated
I also had my hair done in the salon for the renewal
I rated it a 4 out of 5 only because the room we had could have used some updating however the bed and linens were fantastic
Room was great in building A looks like it was recently renovated
It was wonderful to catch up with them and renew the friendships
The rooms were renovated a couple of years ago and are great
We stayed in the newly renovated beachfront rooms very nice and the location was very convenient to the beach pool and most of the restaurants
We got upgraded to a renovated room in the A block which was central to everything
We stayed in the renovated block B on the 3rd floor
We celebrated our 5 year anniversary with a vow renewal couples massage and dinner on the beach
Rekindle Renew Repeat
We would love to return again to this wonderful relaxing resort once the renovations have taken place
I found the resort to be in great shape and know that after the refresh in the next few months things will be even more amazing
